mapper.update: update building set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, residential_area = #{residentialArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, units = #{units,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_elevator = #{hasElevator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_underground = #{hasUnderground,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.residential_area, r.name AS residentialAreaName, b.units, b.has_elevator, p.type_name AS hasElevatorName, b.has_underground, p2.type_name AS hasUndergroundName FROM building b LEFT JOIN residential_area r ON b.residential_area = r.id LEFT JOIN param_config p ON b.has_elevator = p.type_id LEFT JOIN param_config p2 ON b.has_underground = p2.type_id WHERE p.type = 'hasornot' AND p2.type = 'hasornot' AND b.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, residential_area, units, has_elevator, has_underground from building
